title: A Real Tisa from Mitja
content:
Mitja Miklavcic’s FF Tisa makes the latest featured face list for this forum. Mitja is yet another Reading grad making good on making type.

[http://www.fontfont.com/cgi-bin/showfont.pl?name=Tisa+Pro&aid=7](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011050837/http:/www.fontfont.com/cgi-bin/showfont.pl?name=Tisa+Pro&aid=7 "http://www.fontfont.com/cgi-bin/showfont.pl?name=Tisa+Pro&aid=7")

ChrisL

 [‹ Books (and typefaces) from the first half of XIX century](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011050837/http:/typophile.com/node/47421 "Go to previous forum topic") [Problem with Double Quotes in Arno Pro ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011050837/http:/typophile.com/node/47417 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Read more about FF Tisa [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011050837/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/july08a/).
